turns.content:
Display the following data as a HTML page with a professional look. This page will display the issues fixed in a software release. Data: Issue Type Summary
Task Tablet - Display QMD number on main page
UI Change Tablet - Final Review page has the last digit of work order missing
Task Tablet - Add SOP guidance reference to Fusion Type selection
Bug Tablet/API - Issues with API returning failure message but data downloading
Bug Tablet/API - Issues with not updating changed values/not downloading values at all
Story Tablet - Test Upload Button
Story Tablet/Server - Create a button that sends the database to the server and a log on weld.isco-pipe.com that shows sent databases
Story Tablet - Automatic "Other" Field Guessing - Spell check/suggest machines when "other" button is pressed

Here is the HTML code for the page you requested: ```css

Issues Fixed in Software Release

Issue Type Summary
Task Tablet - Display QMD number on main page
UI Change Tablet - Final Review page has the last digit of work order missing
Task Tablet - Add SOP guidance reference to Fusion Type selection
Bug Tablet/API - Issues with API returning failure message but data downloading
Bug Tablet/API - Issues with not updating changed values/not downloading values at all
Story Tablet - Test Upload Button
Story Tablet/Server - Create a button that sends the database to the server and a log on weld.isco-pipe.com that shows sent databases
Story Tablet - Automatic "Other" Field Guessing - Spell check/suggest machines when "other" button is pressed
```
Do the same HTML page but change "Story" to "New Feature" and "Task" to "Existing Feature Change"

Here is the updated HTML code with the changes you requested: ```css

Issues Fixed in Software Release

Issue Type Summary
Existing Feature Change Tablet - Display QMD number on main page
UI Change Tablet - Final Review page has the last digit of work order missing
Existing Feature Change Tablet - Add SOP guidance reference to Fusion Type selection
Bug Tablet/API - Issues with API returning failure message but data downloading
Bug Tablet/API - Issues with not updating changed values/not downloading values at all
New Feature Tablet - Test Upload Button
New Feature Tablet/Server - Create a button that sends the database to the server and a log on weld.isco-pipe.com that shows sent databases
New Feature Tablet - Automatic "Other" Field Guessing - Spell check/suggest machines when "other" button is pressed
```

Do the same HTML page but make sure it's in Open Sans and the table header has a blue background with white text. Instead of "Issues Fixed in Software Release" it should say "Release Notes for Q1 2023 Stable Release 1"

Here is the updated HTML code with the changes you requested: ```css

Release Notes for Q1 2023 Stable Release 1

Issue Type Summary
Existing Feature Change Tablet - Display QMD number on main page
UI Change Tablet - Final Review page has the last digit of work order missing

Bug Tablet/API - Issues with API returning failure message but data downloading
Bug Tablet/API - Issues with not updating changed values/not downloading values at all
New Feature Tablet - Test Upload Button
New Feature Tablet/Server - Create a button that sends the database to the server and a log on weld.isco-pipe.com that shows sent databases
New Feature Tablet - Automatic "Other" Field Guessing - Spell check/suggest machines when "other" button is pressed
```
Sort the Issue Types by the following order - New Features, Existing Feature Changes, UI Changes, Bugs

Here is the updated HTML code with the changes you requested:
